mapper.insert: insert into qna (qna_no, member_id, product_num, qna_re, qna_content, qna_date, qna_group) values (qna_seq.nextval, #{member_id}, #{product_num}, #{qna_re}, #{qna_content}, sysdate, qna_seq.nextval)
insert into qna (qna_no, member_id, product_num, qna_re, qna_content, qna_date, qna_group) values (qna_seq.nextval, #{member_id}, #{product_num}, #{qna_re}, #{qna_content}, sysdate, #{qna_group})
mapper.select: select * from (select rownum rnum, qna.* from qna order by qna_no desc) where rnum >= ((#{page}-1) * 5+1) and rnum <= (#{page} * 5) order by qna_group desc, qna_re asc
